resources.string: Success !\nYou can add another user or go back and select a user.
You haven\'t selected any user yet. Please touch on \'Users\' button
Touch a use to select it
You haven\'t selected any network. Cannot start an instance without a network to attach.
You must put a name for the instance.
Instances successfully delete. Update window to refresh view.
Some instance hasn\'t been found in the server (probably was already in deleting state)…\nDeletion\'s finished, refresh the window.
You cannot specify custom IP address with more than one instance to launch.
This floating IP is not associated to any server.
Pick a server to which associate the floating IP
This floating IP is already associated to a server. If you continue, the association will be moved to the choosen server.
Floating IP already associated to this server.
This IP is still associated to a server and cannot be released.\nTry to refresh the window pressing Menu->Update.
Please wait: connecting to remote server…
Are you sure to delete this instance ?
Are you sure to delete all instances ?
Image has been launched. Go to Instances window to see it.
Floating IP has been dissociated from the server. Press on Menu->Update to refresh window if you still see the server name.
Floating IP has been associated to the server. Press on Menu->Update to refresh window if you do not see the server name yet.
The selected network is not of external type. You can get Floating IP only from External networks.\nSelect a different network (if any).
You haven\'t selected any external network (or you cannot access to any one).
Floating IP allocated. Press on Menu->Update to refresh window if you do not see it yet.
Floating IP released. Press on Menu->Update to refresh window if you still see it.
There\'re no instance to associate this floating IP.
Are you sure to delete this Security Group ?
Snapshot created. Go to \'Images\' window to see it.
